docs.abstract: It's open enrollment season, meaning it's also time for a careful reading of any changes in your health insurance.
docs.snippet: It's open enrollment season, meaning it's also time for a careful reading of any changes in your health insurance.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some employees might think this is open season, not open enrollment. The Kaiser Family Foundation survey that came out Tuesday painted a dismal picture of sharply raising health insurance premiums this year, even as any recovery in the economy appears stalled.

headline.main: Bachmann Gives 'Don't Settle' Speech at Liberty University

docs.abstract: Michele Bachmann recounts her spiritual awakening in telling students at a Christian college that they should not settle in their personal lives, or in picking a president.
docs.snippet: Michele Bachmann recounts her spiritual awakening in telling students at a Christian college that they should not settle in their personal lives, or in picking a president.

docs.lead_paragraph: Representative Michele Bachmann on Wednesday repeated the phrase "don't settle" over and over to students at Liberty University, founded by the Rev. Jerry Falwell, referring to their choice of major, a spouse and a career, as well as their dreams for the country's future.

headline.main: Bachmann Gives 'Don't Settle' Speech at Liberty University

docs.lead_paragraph: A $50 Billion Claim of Havoc Looms for Bank of America | The lawsuit by Bank of America shareholders that claims the bank and its executives failed to disclose a $15.3 billion loss at Merrill Lynch before its acquisition casts a dark shadow over the already troubled bank.

headline.main: To Hail a Livery Cab in the Bronx, Go to Albany

docs.abstract: The Day: One of New York City's eternal bafflements is a political structure that enables someone from, say, Jamestown, N.Y., to decide what the rules should be for hailing a cab on the Grand Concourse. Also, what City Room is reading in other papers and blogs.
